gurmukhi: Bey qaun ky kaurvM kUr krmM ]
transliteration: Bhae Taoun Ke Kaurvan Koor Karamannd||
translation: In his house there were Kauravas of vicious Karmas,

gurmukhi: kIE CqRxM jYx kul CYx krmM ]42]210]
transliteration: Keeo Chhatranan Jain Kul Chhain Karamannd||42||210||
translation: Who worked as a chisel (destroyer) for the clan of Kshatriyas.42.210.
They made Bhishama the General of their forces;

gurmukhi: BieE kRu`D ju`DM smUh pMf rwjM ]
transliteration: Bhaio Kruddh Juddhan Samoond Pand Raajan||
translation: In great fury they waged their war against the sons of Pandu.
In that war, the Supreme hereo Arjuna roared.

gurmukhi: Dnur byd igAwqw qjy prm qIrM ]43]211]
transliteration: Dhanur Bed Giaataa Taje Param Tderan||43||211||
translation: He was an adept in archery and shot his shafts superbly.43.211.
The great hero Arjuna shot his chain of arrows in the field (with such skill),
That he killed Bhishama and destroyed al his forces.
He gave Bhishama the bed of arrows, on which he lay down.
The great Pandava (Arjuna) attained the victory comfortably.44.212.
The second general of Kauravas and master of their forces was Daronacharya.

gurmukhi: BieE Gor ju`DM qhwN qaun kwlM ]
transliteration: Bhaio Gor Juddhan Tahaan Taoun Kaalan||
translation: There at that time a horrible war was waged.

gurmukhi: hixE DiRst dRoxM qjy dRox pRwxM ]
transliteration: Hanio Dhrist Dronan Taje Dron Praanan||
translation: Dhrishtadyumna killed Dronacharya, who breathed his last.

gurmukhi: kirE ju`D qy dyv lokM ipAwxM ]45]213]
transliteration: Kario Juddh Te Dev Lokan Piaanan||45||213||
translation: Dying in the battlefield, he went to heaven.45.213.
